text:
@WhiteHouse So far 14,600 Americans have died from the #coronavirus.
13,283 the African-American War

4,576 Iraq War

4,196 Philippine-American War

2,246  Spanish-American War

2,216 War in Afghanistan 

Will more Usa lives be lost from the #coronavirus then the American Civil War 750,000 ?
